div.p: Lewis Gilles to Acting Colonial Architect
53/129, p. number, unit 1, VPRS 3149 outward letter book, VA 856 Colonial Secretary's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Transcribed 28.3.91. To proof.
By desire of the L. G. I do myself the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 28th ultimo in reply to mine of the [19] March last requesting an augmentation of the authority given therein to the amount of £25. relative to the purchase of a horse for the botanic gardens.
In reply I have the honor by direction of the L. G. to
convey to you H. E.'s approval of the increase proposed of which the auditor general has been notified.
